mapper.select: select CON.NO as contentsNo, CON.TITLE as title, CON.SUMMARY as summary, CON.URL as url , to_char(CON.LAST_SCRAPED, 'YYYY. MM. DD.') as lastScraped, CON.BAN as ban , SOU.NAME as sourceName, SOU.URL as sourceUrl, CAT.CATEGORY as categoryName, DAT.DATA_TYPE as dataType , count(SAV.CONTENTS_NO) as saveCnt, count(SPA.CONTENTS_NO) as reportCnt, count(LIK.CONTENTS_NO) as likeCnt , CON.VIEW_CNT as viewCnt from Q_CONTENTS CON inner join Q_CATEGORY CAT on CAT.NO = CON.CATEGORY_NO inner join Q_SOURCE SOU on SOU.NO = CON.SOURCE_NO inner join Q_DATA_TYPE DAT on DAT.NO = SOU.DATA_TYPE left join Q_CONTENTS_SAVED SAV on SAV.CONTENTS_NO = CON.NO left join Q_CONTENTS_SPAM SPA on SPA.CONTENTS_NO = CON.NO left join Q_LIKE LIK on LIK.CONTENTS_NO = CON.NO where CON.BAN = 'N' and CON.NO = #{contentsNo} group by CON.NO, SOU.NO, CAT.NO, DAT.NO

select CON.NO as contentsNo, CON.TITLE as title, CON.SUMMARY as summary, CON.URL as url , to_char(CON.LAST_SCRAPED, 'YYYY. MM. DD.') as lastScraped, CON.BAN as ban , SOU.NAME as sourceName, SOU.URL as sourceUrl, CAT.CATEGORY as categoryName, DAT.DATA_TYPE as dataType , count(SAV.CONTENTS_NO) as saveCnt, count(SPA.CONTENTS_NO) as reportCnt, count(LIK.CONTENTS_NO) as likeCnt , CON.VIEW_CNT as viewCnt from Q_CONTENTS CON inner join Q_CATEGORY CAT on CAT.NO = CON.CATEGORY_NO inner join Q_SOURCE SOU on SOU.NO = CON.SOURCE_NO inner join Q_DATA_TYPE DAT on DAT.NO = SOU.DATA_TYPE left join Q_CONTENTS_SAVED SAV on SAV.CONTENTS_NO = CON.NO left join Q_CONTENTS_SPAM SPA on SPA.CONTENTS_NO = CON.NO left join Q_LIKE LIK on LIK.CONTENTS_NO = CON.NO where CON.BAN = 'N' group by CON.NO, SOU.NO, CAT.NO, DAT.NO

select MMO.NO as no, MMO.MESSAGE as message , to_char(MMO.REG_DATE, 'YYYY. MM. DD.') as regDate , CON.TITLE as contentsTitle, MBR.FIRST_NAME as firstName, MBR.LAST_NAME as lastName from Q_MEMO MMO inner join Q_CONTENTS CON on CON.NO = MMO.CONTENTS_NO inner join Q_MEMBER MBR on MBR.NO = MMO.MEMBER_NO where MMO.BAN = 'N' and MMO.CONTENTS_NO = #{contentsNo} order by MMO.REG_DATE desc
